comment: used hop bags, didn't get good flavor and aroma, too short a time in whirlpool or bags hurt isomerization of hops, pale lager has a nice citra and malty character before carb
oh wow the IPL is fantastic during dry hop, a grapefruit and bubblegum fruity bomb! pale lager is really coming together as well.

IPL is fantastic! a nice hoppy bomb of fruit and berries and citrus!  
pale alger is very nice as well.  malty as all get out. very clean, bready, slightly sweet, more wil develop soon. its coming together nicely, beautiful color! a bronze to light amber
